meanings.definition: A color intermediate between red and blue.
meanings.sent1: The sky turned a beautiful purple as the sun set.
meanings.sent2: She wore a lovely purple dress to the party.
meanings.sent3: The purple flowers in the garden seemed to be gossiping with each other.
meanings.sent4: His face turned purple with anger when he found out the truth.
meanings.sent5: The purple of the mountains at dawn was breathtaking.

meanings.definition: A garment of this color, especially a robe worn by a high official in ancient Rome or Byzantium.
meanings.sent1: The king's purple robe shimmered in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: She admired the intricate embroidery on the purple cloak.
meanings.sent3: The purple robe made him feel like a royal wizard.
meanings.sent4: She wrapped herself in the purple garment, feeling regal.
meanings.sent5: The purple of the robe symbolized power and authority.
